import React, { useState } from "react"; function ExpertReviews({ products }) { const [openId, setOpenId] = useState(null); const toggleOpen = (id) => { setOpenId(openId === id ? null : id); }; return (

Expert Reviews

Our in-depth analysis of each antivirus solution based on extensive testing.

{products.map((product) => (
toggleOpen(product.ProductID)} >

{product.ProductName}

⭐ {product.AverageRating ? product.AverageRating.toFixed(1) : "N/A"} / 5.0
{openId === product.ProductID ? "▲" : "▼"}
{openId === product.ProductID && (

Our Review

{product.review || "No review available."}

Pros:
    {product.pros?.length > 0 ? ( product.pros.map((pro, idx) =>
  • {pro}
    • ) ) : (
  • None listed
    • )}
Cons:
    {product.cons?.length > 0 ? ( product.cons.map((con, idx) =>
  • {con}
    • ) ) : (
  • None listed
    • )}
Bottom Line

{product.bottomLine || "Summary not available."}

Test Results

Malware Protection: {product.malwareProtection || "N/A"}/5
Performance Impact: {product.performanceImpact || "N/A"}/5
User Interface: {product.userInterface || "N/A"}/5
Value for Money: {product.valueForMoney || "N/A"}/5
Protection Features
  • Advanced threat defense
  • Multi-layer ransomware protection
  • Vulnerability assessment
  • Web attack prevention
  • Anti-phishing protection
)}
))}
); } export default ExpertReviews;
